Articles.Content: i first like to say wow on the part of aircraft physics im building 5 aircraft 4 already done just need to tweak there all high performance planes that sadly wont run well in space (there jets) but are capable of entering space but fall like a rock after apoapsis but they are high speed aircraft most unstable i will post them in a bit once i figure out some tweaks and let me say theres nothing special about em there all regular design quick builds that were my first planes so yeah onward to the buildshttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_cheesy.gif
